body:
### PR description

As per title: first JSON configuration for phase-2 initialStep mkFit tracking iteration.
It is required by PR https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/44708.

### PR validation

Please, refer to PR https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/44708
title: First JSON configuration for phase-2 initialStep mkFit tracking iteration
